price: Bantu! Enda rero nyabuna nimuhungire ibihano vy’Imana Allah, mu kwirukira ku mpuhwe zayo, maze mwemere mwongere mugamburukire Imana Allah hamwe n’Intumwa yayo. Mu vy’ukuri jewe kuri mwebwe, ndi Umugabisha ku bihano vyayo, atomora amabwirizwa yayo[651].
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: [651] Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) iyo hagize ikiyigora, yaca iremururira umushaha wayo kw’isengesho, ubwo bukaba ari uburyo bumwe mu buryo bwo guhungira ku Mana Allah.

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
